name: Team BlueRidge
body:
### Welcome to Team BlueRidge.
Team BlueRidge prides themselves on great Android development. We rely on our users to stay awesome, and we always are looking for new talent

### Our Projects
Team BlueRidge is dedicated to being open-source. That means all of our work is on GitHub. Just look at any of our repos to see our projects. [BlueBot](/bluebot/) is one of our many projects, including ROMs and our website.

### Authors and Contributors
@kalaker, @insink71, and @eoghan2t7 are all members of Team BlueRidge.

### Support or Contact
Having issues with anything? Contact @kalaker, @insink71, or @eoghan2t7
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
